name: Plantera_InkQuill Studio
description:
In Plantera, you’re a magical wizard whom is a member of the guild that is tasked to face against the Guardians of Continents. Amongst the action you’re expected to go up against different phases, special attacks & difficulty from The Guardians of the Continents.

Platform : Windows / PC (Using Controller Only)

Controller Supported : Xbox & PS4 Controllers Only.
